titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of a Borrower's Card: Henry Church

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

change.ab:
Encoded Cards Ville d'Avray - settlement or name of place? S&O = Seine-Ouest, I believe. A suburb of Paris?
Made the following corrections (still some uncertainties here). s4: = no idea, "Curious Hans Mendes"? ==> ? s6: = "Flusc"? ==> FLUX s7: = "Mar" or "May" s8: Date for Night Wood is cut off s10: = date unclear ==> NOV 1931 s13: = Erased writing under "Old Calabria" = name written lightly in pencil next to "Roditi" s14: = unclear note after "Three plays" s15: = note next to "Poems," unclear ==> RARE s17: = "Nouslette"? = "Whiter"? s18: = notation indicating that books were bought? "bot"? ==> BOT s19: illegible handwriting, three titles unknown ==> STUDS LONIGAN, SIREN LAND, IN HAZARD = illegible date ==> CLARIFIED Nov 19 = lots of weird somewhat illegible markings on "Life and Letters" ==> 11/22 = illegible, related to "Roan Stallion" by Robison Jeffers s20: = "Thutso's"? ==> THURSO'S LANDING (Robinson Jeffers) = "Flushing"? ==> FLUSHING = "Dial"? ==> TRIAL s21: = date illegible, written over with marker ==> JAN 26 = "Flusc"? ==> FLUX = inkblot over writing ==> ?? TRAIN MURDERS s22: = "closing"? ==> CLOSING = "Puritan"? ==> PURITAN = "ten"? very difficult handwriting ==> WE ARE TEN s23: = date overwritten/blocked out s24: = "Distinctive"? ==> DISTINCTIVE s26: = no idea ==> YORKER (New Yorker) s28: = "Mesures"? ==> Mesures s29: = "K" or "R"? can't find reference for this work ==> KROUGLIAKOFF

Transcribed cards. s4: = no idea, "Curious Hans Mendes"? s6: = "Flusc"? s7: = "Mar" or "May" ==> May s8: Date for Night Wood is cut off s10: = date unclear s13: = Erased writing under "Old Calabria" = name written lightly in pencil next to "Roditi" s14: = unclear note after "Three plays" s15: = note next to "Poems," unclear s17: = "Nouslette"? = "Whiter"? s18: = notation indicating that books were bought? "bot"? s19: illegible handwriting, three titles unknown = illegible date = lots of weird somewhat illegible markings on "Life and Letters" = illegible, related to "Roan Stallion" by Robison Jeffers s20: = "Thutso's"? = "Flushing"? = "Dial"? s21: = date illegible, written over with marker = "Flusc"? = inkblot over writing s22: = "closing"? = "Puritan"? = "ten"? very difficult handwriting s23: = date overwritten/blocked out s24: = "Distinctive"? s26: = no idea s28: = "Mesures"? s29: = "K" or "R"? can't find reference for this work
